query: best dog friendly hotels in new york
title: What are the Best Dog Friendly Hotels in New York?
excerpt: Finding dog-friendly hotels in New York can be a daunting task, especially with the city's bustling atmosphere and diverse accommodations. This list is valuable because it highlights not only where you can stay with your furry friend but also the unique amenities and services that cater to both you and your dog. With the right information, you can ensure a memorable trip that includes your beloved pet without compromising on comfort or convenience.
intro: Discover the best dog-friendly hotels in New York, where your four-legged companion will be just as pampered as you are.

hotels.name: The Ritz-Carlton New York, Central Park
hotels.description: Experience unparalleled luxury at the Ritz-Carlton New York Central Park, where stunning views of Central Park complement the sophisticated townhouse-inspired design of each guest room and suite. Enjoy convenient access to Fifth Avenue shopping, Rockefeller Center, and iconic attractions like Radio City Music Hall, all just a short stroll away. Indulge in world-class amenities including the exclusive La Prairie Spa and a state-of-the-art fitness center for an unforgettable city getaway.
hotels.highlight: Offers pet-friendly accommodations with stunning Central Park views and access to luxury amenities and nearby attractions.

hotels.name: The Shelburne Sonesta New York
hotels.description: Discover a prime getaway at The Shelburne Sonesta New York, nestled in the vibrant Murray Hill neighborhood and just steps from Grand Central Station. Enjoy spacious guest rooms with modern amenities, including kitchenettes and cozy seating, while taking advantage of luxurious services like a 24-hour fitness center and grocery shopping assistance. With major attractions like the Empire State Building and Museum of Modern Art nearby, your New York City adventure awaits.
hotels.highlight: The Shelburne Sonesta New York offers pet-friendly accommodations, a 24-hour fitness center, and on-site dining options.

hotels.name: Kimpton Hotel Eventi, an IHG Hotel
hotels.description: Discover the luxury of Kimpton Hotel Eventi, a stylish boutique hotel in Chelsea that combines modern amenities with unparalleled convenience. Each room features a 37-inch flat-screen TV and a mini bar, while guests can enjoy a 24-hour fitness center, meeting facilities, and a delightful dining experience at The Vine restaurant, which offers complimentary morning coffee and evening wine. Located near iconic New York City landmarks, this hotel is the perfect base for an unforgettable getaway.
hotels.highlight: Offers pet-friendly accommodations, a stylish restaurant, and bike-friendly amenities in the heart of Chelsea.

hotels.name: Paramount Hotel Times Square
hotels.description: Experience the elegance of The Paramount Hotel, a boutique gem in New York's Theater District featuring 605 luxurious rooms equipped with flat-screen TVs, iPod docking stations, and premium bedding for ultimate comfort. With a 24-hour front desk, modern fitness center, and convenient meeting spaces, this hotel ensures a seamless stay. Just steps from Times Square and nearby attractions, the dedicated concierge is ready to assist with personalized dining and entertainment arrangements for an unforgettable city experience.
hotels.highlight: Offers pet-friendly accommodations with pet bowls and family rooms, ensuring a comfortable stay for guests and their furry companions.

hotels.name: Pestana Park Avenue
hotels.description: Pestana Park Avenue offers luxurious air-conditioned rooms equipped with modern amenities, including flat-screen TVs and free WiFi, with some providing breathtaking views of the city. Located in the heart of New York City, guests enjoy easy access to iconic attractions like the Empire State Building and Grand Central Station. The hotel's 24/7 multilingual staff is dedicated to ensuring a seamless experience, making it the ideal choice for comfort and exceptional service in the Big Apple.
hotels.highlight: Pestana Park Avenue provides pet-friendly accommodations, a terrace, and a convenient room service app for guests traveling with dogs.

hotels.name: The Standard - East Village
hotels.description: Experience luxury at The Standard - East Village, where modern rooms feature plush bedding, flat-screen TVs, and designer toiletries.
